hospitality.title: Ensuring Your Comfort, Our Duty
hospitality.description: We prioritize your comfort and safety in our hospitality services. Our team ensures high standards of hygiene and personalized care for a memorable stay. Your satisfaction is our commitment.

docs.title: Docs
docs.content: Find in-depth information about Next.js features and API.

deploy.title: Deploy
deploy.content: Instantly deploy yout Next.js site to a shareable URL with Vercel.
